widgets.title: Active Surveys
widgets.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM surveys WHERE is_active = 1

widgets.title: Open Tickets
widgets.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'open'

widgets.title: Pending Feedback
widgets.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feedback WHERE status = 'pending'

sections.title: Recent User Activities
sections.query: SELECT a.*, u.username FROM audit_logs a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.id ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT 10

sections.title: Recent Tickets
sections.query: SELECT t.*, u.username FROM support_tickets t LEFT JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.id ORDER BY t.created_at DESC LIMIT 5

sections.title: Recent Feedback
sections.query: SELECT f.*, u.username FROM feedback f LEFT JOIN users u ON f.user_id = u.id ORDER BY f.created_at DESC LIMIT 5

sections.title: Upcoming Surveys
sections.query: SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE starts_at > NOW() ORDER BY starts_at ASC LIMIT 5
